Posts.EditableText: I've started to post "kid-friendly" versions of the PDF Quest tutorial on YouTube. They follow the printed documentation and include audio narration. Here are the URLs for the first 3 lessons: Quest - Chapter 3 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8EVNXTiOjUA Quest - Chapter 4 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uJmHEBQ0U-w Quest - Chapter 5 - Part 1 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MeagA0d6ij4 Quest - Chapter 5 - Part 2 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yad2P2qzB_U I expect to have Lessons 6-10 done by the middle of October, 11-16 by the end of the month, and 17-21 by the middle of November.
Posts.HTML:
I've started to post "kid-friendly" versions of the PDF Quest tutorial on YouTube.
They follow the printed documentation and include audio narration.
Here are the URLs for the first 3 lessons:

Quest - Chapter 3 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8EVNXTiOjUA

Quest - Chapter 4 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uJmHEBQ0U-w

Quest - Chapter 5 - Part 1 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MeagA0d6ij4

Quest - Chapter 5 - Part 2 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yad2P2qzB_U


I expect to have Lessons 6-10 done by the middle of October, 11-16 by the end of the month, and 17-21 by the middle of November.

Posts.EditableText: nice work and a nice voice
Posts.HTML: nice work and a nice voice
